author: @bbcmundo
title: Canad√° recorta el n√∫mero de migrantes que aceptar√° para detener el crecimiento de su poblaci√≥n - BBC News Mundo
text:
24 octubre 2024 Canad√° anunci√≥ un fuerte recorte del n√∫mero de inmigrantes que permite entrar en el pa√≠s en un esfuerzo por ‚Äúfrenar el crecimiento demogr√°fico‚Äù, una decisi√≥n que supone un notable cambio en la pol√≠tica del gobierno de primer ministro Justin Trudeau.
Como parte de los cambios, el pa√≠s norteamericano reducir√° el n√∫mero de residentes permanentes en 2025 a 395.000, lo cual es 21% menos de los casi 500.000 autorizados hasta ahora .
Trudeau dijo que su gobierno ‚Äúno obtuvo el equilibrio adecuado‚Äù cuando reforz√≥ la inmigraci√≥n despu√©s de la pandemia, cuando el pa√≠s buscaba hacer frente a la escasez de mano de obra.
El apoyo a la pol√≠tica de apertura tambi√©n ha ido disminuyendo. Seg√∫n las encuestas, existe una creciente preocupaci√≥n entre los canadienses por la llegada de m√°s inmigrantes y su impacto en temas como la vivienda y los servicios sociales .
La medida se suma a la ya anunciada reducci√≥n de la admisi√≥n de estudiantes internacionales y trabajadores extranjeros temporales.
El anuncio Este jueves Trudeau y el ministro de Inmigraci√≥n, Marc Miller, anunciaron que habr√≠a recortes que limitar√≠an la llegada de extranjeros a vivir al pa√≠s.
El objetivo, dijo Miller, es fijar una meta menor de 365.000 nuevos residentes permanentes para 2027.
Esta reducci√≥n detendr√° el crecimiento de la poblaci√≥n en Canad√° durante los pr√≥ximos dos a√±os, dijo Trudeau, lo que dar√° tiempo a las provincias para reforzar sus programas sanitarios y sus esquemas de vivienda.
Trudeau afirm√≥ que ‚Äúlos canadienses est√°n justificadamente orgullosos‚Äù de su sistema de inmigraci√≥n abierto, el cual ha contribuido a impulsar la econom√≠a del pa√≠s y a construir comunidades con diversidad.
‚ÄúNuestro sistema de inmigraci√≥n siempre ha sido responsable y flexible‚Äù, afirm√≥ Trudeau. ‚ÄúActuamos hoy debido a que en los tiempos dif√≠ciles en que intent√°bamos salir de la pandemia, atendiendo las necesidades de mano de obra y el crecimiento de la poblaci√≥n, no conseguimos el equilibrio adecuado ‚Äù.
Casi todo el crecimiento demogr√°fico de Canad√° el a√±o pasado -alrededor del 97%- se debi√≥ a la inmigraci√≥n, seg√∫n datos federales.
Al mismo tiempo, la tasa de desempleo en el pa√≠s ha aumentado hasta el 6,5% . Entre los j√≥venes supera el 14%.
La presi√≥n social En el √∫ltimo medio siglo, Canad√° se ha transformado en una naci√≥n multicultural.
Con una inmensa superficie habitada por solo 12 millones de personas tras la Segunda Guerra Mundial, el gobierno canadiense promovi√≥ durante las siguientes d√©cadas pol√≠ticas para atraer a extranjeros que poblaran el pa√≠s y expandieran su econom√≠a.
Adem√°s de convertir a Canad√° en una de las sociedades m√°s multiculturales del mundo , la inmigraci√≥n ha sido un motor clave de crecimiento al aportar talento y mano de obra a las empresas.
La nueva medida supone un cambio con respecto a d√©cadas de pol√≠ticas de inmigraci√≥n abiertas, en las que Canad√° ha confiado en los reci√©n llegados para cumplir los objetivos de poblaci√≥n y cubrir las carencias de mano de obra.
Fuente de la imagen, Getty Images
Pie de foto, El sector de la construcci√≥n es uno de los que emplea m√°s inmigrantes en Canad√°. Desde que Trudeau fue elegido en 2015, su gobierno ha elevado los objetivos anuales de residentes permanentes de 272.000 a 485.000 este a√±o. El mayor salto se produjo en 2021, tras la pandemia de covid-19.
Pero Trudeau y su gobierno han sido objeto de cr√≠ticas por aumentar la inmigraci√≥n sin reforzar los servicios sociales o la construcci√≥n de viviendas , que han enfrentado problemas por el r√°pido crecimiento de la poblaci√≥n, seg√∫n los economistas. Los servicios p√∫blicos como la sanidad tambi√©n han tenido dificultades.
A principios de este mes, una encuesta del Instituto Environics, que ha seguido de cerca las actitudes de los canadienses hacia la inmigraci√≥n desde 1977, revel√≥ que el 58% de los entrevistados considera ahora que los niveles de inmigraci√≥n son demasiado altos.
Seg√∫n el instituto, los resultados sugieren que la opini√≥n p√∫blica en el tema ‚Äúha pasado de ser aceptable (si no valiosa) a problem√°tica‚Äù.
Los precios promedio de las viviendas en Canad√° rondan los 700.000 d√≥lares canadienses (US$517.400) y los alquileres han aumentado un 22% en los √∫ltimos dos a√±os.
Pero los recortes a la inmigraci√≥n tambi√©n han sido criticados por grupos activistas, como la Red por los Derechos de los Inmigrantes, que escribi√≥ en una carta abierta a Trudeau y Miller dici√©ndoles que se est√° culpando injustamente a los extranjeros de la problem√°tica .
‚ÄúLos inmigrantes no son responsables de la crisis de la vivienda en Canad√°, ni de la falta de empleo, ni de la inadecuada asistencia sanitaria u otros servicios p√∫blicos‚Äù, afirmaron.
El grupo a√±adi√≥ que estos problemas son m√°s bien el resultado de ‚Äúd√©cadas de pol√≠ticas federales y provinciales que han infrafinanciado y privatizado los servicios p√∫blicos‚Äù.
Trabajadores y estudiantes Desde hace meses, Canad√° comenz√≥ a implementar algunos de los cambios en la pol√≠tica.
Respecto a los trabajadores en empresas canadienses, sus patrones han tenido que reducir la cantidad de extranjeros temporales o demostrar que esos puestos no pueden ser ocupados por un residente permanente o un ciudadano canadiense.
Las sectores con m√°s excepciones han sido los obreros de la construcci√≥n y el personal sanitario , pues ambos han enfrentado escasez de mano de obra.
A principios de este a√±o, Miller tambi√©n estableci√≥ un l√≠mite en el n√∫mero de estudiantes extranjeros que admitir√≠a Canad√° durante los pr√≥ximos a√±os, lo que result√≥ en una disminuci√≥n planificada del 35% en las aprobaciones de permisos de estudio.
M√°s de 800.000 estudiantes extranjeros viv√≠an en Canad√° en 2022, frente a 214.000 una d√©cada antes.
Esa medida tambi√©n ha recibido cr√≠ticas, en particular de algunas instituciones de educaci√≥n superior de todo el pa√≠s a quienes preocupa que disuada a los estudiantes de venir a Canad√° en favor de otros destinos.
Algunas universidades alegaron que un l√≠mite supondr√≠a una p√©rdida de ingresos para sus instituciones.
Haz clic aqu√≠ para leer m√°s historias de BBC News Mundo.
Suscr√≠bete aqu√≠ a nuestro nuevo newsletter para recibir cada viernes una selecci√≥n de nuestro mejor contenido de la semana.
Tambi√©n puedes seguirnos en YouTube , Instagram , TikTok , X , Facebook y en nuestro nuevo canal de WhatsApp .
Y recuerda que puedes recibir notificaciones en nuestra app. Descarga la √∫ltima versi√≥n y act√≠valas.

title: Harvard's stance against Trump's 'hurricane of authoritarianism' inspiring, professor says | Flipboard
text:
Harvard's stance against Trump's 'hurricane of authoritarianism' inspiring, professor says We speak to Alice Jardine, a Research Professor in Studies of Women, Gender, and Sexuality at Harvard University about Trump's crackdown on education. She says that the US administration has unleashed a 'hurricane of authoritarian attacks' and that Harvard's pushback against the demands has ‚Ä¶

author: Owen Jenkins
title: Marvell Technology's Impressive Growth: A 5-Year Journey
text:
Marvell Technology's Impressive Growth: A 5-Year Journey
Owen JenkinsUpdated: 02-27-2025 05:44 PM
Marvell Technology's Success Story
Marvell Technology Inc. (NASDAQ: MRVL) has captured the attention of investors with its remarkable performance over the past five years. The company's annualized return has outstripped market averages by an impressive 18.43%, showcasing an average annual return of 32.7%. Currently, Marvell boasts a market capitalization of approximately $76.32 billion. This strong financial standing reflects Marvell's prowess and resilience in a competitive industry.
Value of Early Investments
If an investor had taken the leap to buy $100 worth of MRVL stock five years ago, that initial investment would have appreciated significantly over time. Today, that $100 would well exceed expectations, growing to about $399.13 based on the current trading price of $88.20 for MRVL. Such growth exemplifies the potent power of compounded returns, which can exponentially increase one‚Äôs investment portfolio when held over time.
Understanding Compounded Returns
Compounded returns can create a profound impact on investment growth. The longer an investment is maintained, the more pronounced the effect of compounding becomes. This principle is crucial for investors to understand, as it emphasizes the importance of long-term holding strategies rather than short-term trading.
Marvell‚Äôs Innovations and Market Position
Marvell Technology has established itself as a leader in data infrastructure technology, contributing to advancements in cloud computing, 5G networks, and automotive applications. The company's commitment to innovation is evident through its substantial investments in research and development, enabling it to stay ahead of industry trends and maintain a competitive edge.
Looking Ahead: Market Trends and Opportunities
The landscape for semiconductor companies is ever-evolving, with significant growth expected in areas like artificial intelligence and IoT (Internet of Things). Marvell is well-positioned to capitalize on these trends, and investors are optimistic about its future prospects. The continued expansion of data centers and the rise of smart technologies further underpin Marvell‚Äôs growth narrative.
Staying Informed as an Investor
For those interested in the financial outcomes of investing in technology stocks like Marvell, it is essential to stay informed. Keeping up with market news, technological advancements, and the company's ongoing projects can provide valuable insights that may inform investment decisions in the future.
Conclusion
The journey of Marvell Technology Inc. over the past five years is a testament to the rewards of long-term investing, especially in technology sectors poised for growth. The impressive returns that investors have enjoyed serve as a reminder that patience often pays off. With foundational strengths and future growth potential, MRVL remains a notable consideration for investors seeking to diversify their portfolios.
Frequently Asked Questions
What factors contributed to Marvell's stock growth over the past five years?
Marvell's stock growth has been driven by its innovations in technology, strong financial performance, and growth in key markets like cloud computing and 5G.
How much would a $100 investment in MRVL be worth today?
A $100 investment in MRVL stock five years ago would be worth approximately $399.13 today.
What is the importance of compounded returns in investing?
Compounded returns significantly enhance investment growth, especially over longer timeframes, allowing initial investments to multiply through reinvestment of earnings.
What sectors is Marvell Technology focusing on?
Marvell Technology is focusing on sectors like cloud computing, driver assistance systems, and IoT solutions, positioning itself to capture future growth opportunities.
How can investors stay updated on Marvell Technology's performance?
Investors can stay updated on Marvell Technology's performance by following market news, analyzing quarterly earnings reports, and monitoring industry trends.
About The Author
Contact Owen Jenkins privately here. Or send an email with ATTN: Owen Jenkins as the subject to contact@investorshangout.com.

It draws in traders of all levels, who exchange market knowledge, investigate trading tactics, and keep an eye on industry developments in real time. Featuring financial articles, stock message boards, quotes, charts, company profiles, and live news updates. Through cooperative learning and a wealth of informational resources, it helps users from novices creating their first portfolios to experts honing their techniques. Investors Hangout does not offer financial advice, and the author is not a licensed financial advisor. Consult a qualified advisor before making any financial or investment decisions based on this article. This article should not be considered advice to purchase, sell, or hold any securities or other investments. If any of the material provided here is inaccurate, please contact us for corrections.

author: LMNeuquen
title: En Rawson empiezan los problemas por el calor: habr√° dos cortes de agua todos los d√≠as
text:
A partir de noviembre habr√° cortes de agua todos los d√≠as en el valle de Chubut , afectando a los habitantes de Rawson y de Playa Uni√≥n, la popular villa balnearia de las afueras de la capital provincial, que ya en esta √©poca empieza a poblarse m√°s .
As√≠ lo inform√≥ este jueves la Cooperativa de Servicios P√∫blicos de Rawson , a trav√©s de un comunicado en el que advirti√≥ sobre la creciente demanda en medio de "las altas temperaturas, el aumento de la poblaci√≥n en Playa Uni√≥n, el riego y el uso de piletas".
Seg√∫n la concesionaria del servicio, la demanda de consumo "supera ampliamente la producci√≥n de la Planta Potabilizadora", lo que lleva a tomar estas medida de emergencia que seguramente condicionar√° el d√≠a a d√≠a en la ciudad.
Los horarios de los cortes en Rawson La jefa del servicio sanitario de la Cooperativa de Rawson , Adriana Bec , explic√≥ que los cortes se realizar√°n en dos franjas horarias: el primer corte diario ser√° de 00:00 a 05:00 horas, y el segundo, de 14:00 a 20:00 horas. No obstante, Bec advirti√≥ que "los horarios podr√≠an variar en funci√≥n de las temperaturas y del consumo de la poblaci√≥n, pero estos ser√°n los rangos establecidos".
La funcionaria tambi√©n subray√≥ la importancia del uso racional del agua, afirmando: "Esperamos poder acortar los cortes, pero eso depender√° del cuidado que tengan nuestros usuarios con el uso del agua potable. Es vital que eviten derrocharla en riegos, ya que este uso representa un alto consumo en esta temporada".
El objetivo principal de los cortes es "recuperar los niveles en las cisternas de reserva", en un contexto en el que, seg√∫n se√±alan desde la Cooperativa, la habilitaci√≥n de nuevos loteos sociales en la zona ha incrementado la demanda de agua potable, complicando a√∫n m√°s la situaci√≥n de abastecimiento.
Pedidos a los usuarios La Cooperativa de Rawson hizo adem√°s un llamado a la comunidad para extremar los cuidados en el uso del agua, ante la situaci√≥n cr√≠tica que se da actualmente, con la obra de ampliaci√≥n de la planta potabilizadora interrumpida y a la espera de que sea retomada.
Entre las recomendaciones, se pidi√≥ evitar conectar bombas clandestinas a la red, ya que esto no solo compromete el sistema, sino que tambi√©n perjudica el servicio en los hogares vecinos.
Playa Uni√≥n En esta √©poca del a√±o, la demanda de agua en el balndeario de Playa Uni√≥n empieza a crecer notoriamente.
En cuanto al llenado de piletas, la concesionaria indic√≥ que el agua debe ser comprada en bloque.
Adem√°s, se record√≥ que los horarios de riego permitidos por ordenanza son de 06:00 a 09:00 y de 21:00 a 00:00, a la espera de que sean cumplidos con rigurosidad.
Tanques domiciliarios Para enfrentar esta crisis h√≠drica, la sugerencia a los vecinos es la instalaci√≥n de tanques domiciliarios con bomba elevadora para asegurar el abastecimiento m√≠nimo para las tareas b√°sicas, durante los horarios sin suministro.
Sin embargo, desde la Cooperativa insistieron en que la soluci√≥n a largo plazo radica en la ampliaci√≥n de la Planta Potabilizadora , una obra que permitir√≠a duplicar la capacidad de producci√≥n a 1.800 metros c√∫bicos por hora.
La entidad tambi√©n mencion√≥ que son necesarias obras complementarias, como la construcci√≥n de un acueducto y nuevos centros de distribuci√≥n.
Y lament√≥ que la obra de ampliaci√≥n de la Planta Potabilizadora se encuentra paralizada y en espera de ser reactivada.
Corte por una aver√≠a en Comodoro Rivadavia En Comodoro Rivadavia, otro importante centro urbano chubutense, tambi√©n hay problemas frecuentes con el suministro de agua.
En esta oportunidad, el corte se da por una aver√≠a en el acueducto entre Cerro Negro y Valle Hermoso , que gener√≥ primero una interrupci√≥n del servicio primero en el sur y el centro de la ciudad, y que desde el mi√©rcoles a las 21 se extendi√≥ a los barrios del norte.
Seg√∫n informo la Sociedad Cooperativa Popular Limitada de Comodoro Rivadavia al ampliar el √°rea afectada, el problema para los usuarios se extender√° hasta las 3 de la madrugada de este viernes 25, seis horas m√°s de lo que se preve√≠a cuando se inici√≥.
Para paliar la situaci√≥n, al igual que en otras oportunidades, se habilitan puntos de recarga de agua potable en distintas zonas de la ciudad.
En la zona norte, est√°n en la Planta Santa Luc√≠a, ubicada entre el club del mismo nombre y el Jard√≠n Juana Manso. En Ciudadela se encuentra en Ruta 3 y ruta 39, mientras que en la zona sur reparten agua en Avda. 10 de Noviembre y calle 714.

author: mid-day online correspondent
title: PM Modi arrives at Vivekananda Rock Memorial, set to meditate till June 1
text: On Thursday, Prime Minister Narendra Modi arrived at the Vivekananda Rock Memorial in Kanyakumari, where he will engage in meditation from this morning until the evening of June 1. It is noteworthy that PM Modi will be meditating day and night in the Dhyan Mandapam, the same location where Swami Vivekanand once meditated. Following the conclusion of the Lok Sabha election campaign, Prime Minister Modi said prayers at the Bhagavathy Amman Temple in Kanyakumari earlier in the day. The prime minister was spotted with an off-white shawl covering his upper torso while donning a dhoti. In Hoshiarpur, Punjab, on Thursday, Prime Minister Modi wrapped up his campaign for the general elections that will take place on June 1. As the Bharatiya Janata Party prepares to enter its third term of government, Prime Minister Modi has travelled the entire nation in support of his partys candidature. Over the course of 75 days, the prime minister conducted about 206 election-related events, such as roadshows and rallies. Additionally, he had almost 80 interviews for various news and media outlets. The rock located at the memorial location had a significant influence on Swami Vivekanandas life. It is thought that this rock had a comparable significance in Swami Vivekanandas life to that of Sarnath in Gautam Buddhas. After travelling the entire nation and engaging in mediation for three days, he arrived here and gained a vision of an advanced India. Legend has it that Goddess Parvati likewise stood on one foot and concentrated there as she awaited Lord Shiva. This is Indias southernmost point. Moreover, this location unites the Eastern and Western coasts of India. Additionally, it is where the Arabian Sea, Bay of Bengal, and Indian Ocean converge. By visiting Kanyakumari, PM Modi is demonstrating his support for national unity. It is well known that the Prime Minister embarks on spiritual pilgrimages following electoral campaigns. He travelled to Kedarnath in 2019 and Shivajis Pratapgarh in 2014. Commencing on April 19, the election for 543 Lok Sabha seats is being conducted in seven stages. June 4 is when the votes will be tallied. (With Inputs from PTI)

author: Oliver Caffrey
title: Mitch Marsh backs Australia to defend any total after rescuing hosts in second Pakistan test | Stuff.co.nz
text: Mitch Marsh backs Australia to defend any total after rescuing hosts in second Pakistan test Mitch Marsh will back Australia in to defend any total against Pakistan after [the allrounder steered the hosts out of major trouble in the Boxing Day test](https://www.stuff.co.nz/sport/cricket/301033220/boxing-day-test-australia-fight-back-after-pakistan-skittle-top-order). Australia will head to the MCG on day four of the second test with a lead of 241, largely thanks to Marsh's sparkling 96 amid a barrage of Pakistani swing bowling. Marsh joined Steve Smith when Australia were reeling at 16-4 on Thursday, but their 153-run stand has likely batted Pakistan out of the match on a wearing pitch. The last team to score more than 300 in the fourth innings of an MCG Test was Pakistan in a losing cause back in 1990. Marsh joked that Australia's tail could still push their lead up to 500 when Alex Carey and Mitchell Starc resume at 187-6 on Friday. ‚ÄúI think if we were all out now we would feel very much in the game,‚Äù Marsh said. ‚ÄúI don't necessarily want to put a number on it for our bowlers, but we know that they can certainly hold the bat. ‚ÄúA couple of good partnerships with some tired bowlers now, hopefully we can get up towards the 300 mark, but I guess anything from here we'll take.‚Äù Marsh praised MCG curator Matt Page for putting together a pitch that has resulted in two entertaining days of cricket once the rain cleared after a dreary opening on Tuesday. The MCG was infamously slapped with a "poor" rating by the International Cricket Council following a dull Ashes draw in 2017. But in the years since, the MCG has become one of the best wickets in the country and is on track to produce a result for a sixth straight test. ‚ÄúWe're now deep into the third innings yet bowlers are still massively in the game, and that bodes well for us if we can get a few more runs,‚Äù Marsh said. ‚ÄúWith our bowlers, hopefully there's still enough seam movement ‚Äì certainly with the new ball it sort of died off a little bit around the 35-over mark. ‚ÄúBut there's still enough and I guess that's what you want, you want it to be entertaining.‚Äù AAP

author: Seyi John Salau
title: Papua New Guinea: Pope prays for divine blessings, consolation for landslide victims
text:
Pope Francis in his weekly General Audience at the Vatican prayed for divine blessings of consolation and strength for victims of the recent landslide in Papua New Guinea, and offered his encouragement to the civil authorities and emergency personnel as they continue their relief efforts.
The Pope, who is set to visit the nation along with Indonesia, Singapore and Timor-Leste, in September, also prayed especially for the deceased, their loved ones, and for the rescue of those still missing.
‚ÄúMay the Lord comfort their families, those who lost their homes and the Papuan people, whom, God willing, I will meet next September.‚Äù
Parts of a mountain in the Maip-Mulitaka area in Enga province in the country‚Äôs north collapsed in the early hours of Friday May 24, 2024.
As the death toll continues to rise, Pope Francis expressed his closeness to all those afflicted by the devastating landslide in Papua New Guinea.
‚ÄúI wish to assure you of my prayers for the victims of the massive landslide that swept through some villages in Papua New Guinea.‚Äù.
Over 2,000 people are estimated to have died, with up to 70,000 people living in the area impacted by the disaster.
Similarly, the Pope insisted that amid war, children are truly the victims who suffer most, as he recalls a recent audience with Ukrainian children who had suffered burns and lost legs in the ‚Äòcruelty‚Äô of war. ‚ÄúChildren suffer‚Ä¶ Children in war suffer.‚Äù
‚ÄúThese little boys and girls have to start walking, to move with artificial arms; they have lost their smiles. It is very bad, very sad when a child loses their smile. Let us pray for the Ukrainian children.‚Äù
The Pope also urged the audience not to forget the great suffering of Palestine and Israel, as he appealed for peace. ‚ÄúLet the war end,‚Äù he stated as he recalled the plight of Myanmar and other countries at war.

author: Francia Quezada
title: La acciones con las que defensa de Jadue buscar√≠a sacarlo de prisi√≥n: acusa "resoluci√≥n injustificada"
text:
Este mi√©rcoles la Corte de Apelaciones de Santiago ratific√≥ la medida cautelar de prisi√≥n preventiva para el alcalde de Recoleta, Daniel Jadue (PC) . Decisi√≥n que mantiene a su defensa inconforme, por lo que insistir√° en revertir la medida que considera como ‚Äúdesproporcionada‚Äù. Lee tambi√©n... Seguir√° en la c√°rcel: Corte ratifica prisi√≥n preventiva de Daniel Jadue por delitos de corrupci√≥n Mi√©rcoles 12 Junio, 2024 | 19:21
Recordemos que al jefe comunal se le imputan delitos de administraci√≥n desleal, estafa, cohecho, delito concursal y fraude al fisco, en el marco el caso Farmacias Populares.
La determinaci√≥n la comunic√≥ la ministra Jessica Gonz√°lez, quien indic√≥ que ‚Äúlos antecedentes calificados (reunidos) determinan que la √∫nica medida que resulta proporcional a los fines del procedimiento es la prisi√≥n preventiva‚Äù.
Mientras que el abogado Ram√≥n Sep√∫lveda indic√≥ que ‚Äúes una resoluci√≥n infundada, injustificada y vamos a ejercer las acciones que correspondan para poder cambiar a la brevedad posible la medida cautelar de Daniel Jadue‚Äù. ¬øCu√°les ser√≠an dichas acciones?
De acuerdo a La Tercera, fuentes cercanas a Jadue descartaron que el abogado recurra a un amparo . M√°s bien, aseguran los personeros, se estar√≠an esperando posibles nuevos antecedentes que permitan solicitar una revisi√≥n de cautelares al Tercer Juzgado de Garant√≠a de Santiago.
Incluso, consign√≥ el medio citado, se pedir√≠a a la fiscal Giovanna Herrera que instruya nuevas diligencias, incluida la toma de declaraciones a otros funcionarios municipales, as√≠ como tambi√©n de la Asociaci√≥n Chilena de Farmacias Populares y de la tienda liderada por Lautaro Carmona.
Asimismo, la recopilaci√≥n de testimonios a las personas beneficiadas por el programa de pr√≥tesis auditivas y otras prestaciones de Achifarp.
Por otro lado, Sep√∫lveda tambi√©n estar√≠a esperando informes policiales que la fiscal pidi√≥ para precisar los costos de las especies incautadas en el caso, las cuales ser√≠an parte del patrimonio de la asociaci√≥n en cuesti√≥n.
Cabe mencionar que el Partido Comunista tambi√©n cumple en rol en la defensa de Daniel Jadue. Tal como se vio en la √∫ltima audiencia, Hugo Guti√©rrez estuvo en primera l√≠nea en apoyo al imputado.
As√≠ como √©l, la diputada Carmen Hertz tambi√©n cumple un rol relevante en la defensa, ya que aunque no tienen incidencia directa en las gestiones judiciales, abordan la arista pol√≠tica del caso.

author: Jack Winter
title: Pistons fans in shambles after wasting golden opportunity to break spell vs Celtics
text: The longest losing streak in NBA history continues after all. Despite leading by 19 points at halftime and drawing [friendly-fire booing](https://clutchpoints.com/celtics-news-boston-booed-by-home-crowd-as-cade-cunningham-pistons-take-massive-halftime-lead) from the TD Garden crowd, the [Detroit Pistons](/nba/detroit-pistons) fell to the [Boston Celtics](/nba/boston-celtics) [128-122](https://www.nba.com/game/det-vs-bos-0022300421/box-score#box-score) in overtime on Thursday night, extending their league record to 28 consecutive losses. Cade Cunningham looked [like a franchise player](https://clutchpoints.com/pistons-news-cade-cunningham-respect-posts-flood-the-internet-amid-detroits-new-low) in defeat for Detroit once again, leading his team's first-half charge with 22 points while playing stellar defense on Jayson Tatum down the stretch. He finished with 31 points, six rebounds, nine assists and two blocks on 12-of-22 overall and 4-of-6 from deep in another awesome individual performance. Jaden Ivey was an impact player, too, scoring 22 points, grabbing 10 rebounds and dishing out five assists. Jalen Duren had 15 points and 14 rebounds, too. The silver lining of the Pistons' streak continuing? Their young players nearly spearheaded a road victory‚Äîwhich would have been the Celtics' first of 2023-23‚Äîagainst the team that just might be the best in basketball. Let's just say it was tough for most Detroit fans and league followers alike to find that sliver of optimism after the game, many singling out coach Monty Williams and making further light of the team's endorsement with Wingstop. Monty in the 3rd Qt [pic.twitter.com/MtRT0RAQsF] ‚Äî College Football Report (@CFBRep) [December 29, 2023] Detroit up 19 at half-time, about to FINALLY end their 27-game losing streak Monty Williams: [pic.twitter.com/7GwHX8guKh] ‚Äî Mo Mooncey (@TheHoopGenius) [December 29, 2023] They should send Monty to the G-League and play Ausar & Sasser. [https://t.co/WMKyWzlBrs] ‚Äî DataDrivenPistonsFan (@D_D_Pistons_Fan) [December 29, 2023] IF WINGSTOP DID THIS FOR EVEY TIME PISTONS LOST WORLD HUNGER WOULD HAVE ENDED BY NOW [pic.twitter.com/2OjY4NOCfB] ‚Äî GURGAVIN (@gurgavin) [December 29, 2023] One day pistons fans will get the wings [pic.twitter.com/iJ11MQZrmK] ‚Äî ùìêùì∑ùì≠ùìªùìÆùîÄ (@ajcelis1997) [December 29, 2023] It‚Äôs time to hang a new banner, yall did ur best [pic.twitter.com/KslgWKu55a] ‚Äî ùôÉùôöùôñùô©ùòæùô™ùô°ùô©ùô™ùôßùôö (@WadexFlash) [December 29, 2023] THE STAPLE OF THE TROY WEAVER ERA [pic.twitter.com/RG0pE88Vzp] ‚Äî john (@jtalkshoops) [December 29, 2023] The Pistons did not lose in regulation [pic.twitter.com/tUHutosCNw] ‚Äî Duncan Smith (@DuncanSmithNBA) [December 29, 2023] Not many expect the Pistons to be competitive on Thursday night despite the absence of Jaylen Brown. Boston hasn't lost at TD Garden in 2023-24, after all, and Detroit's last win came during the first week of the regular season. Maybe the Pistons' encouraging play of late‚Äîthey [almost beat](https://clutchpoints.com/pistons-news-cade-cunninghams-gesture-after-brutal-loss-to-nets-will-give-fans-reason-to-believe-in-future) the Brooklyn Nets on Tuesday‚Äîfinally yields a victory in the team's next matchup, against the Toronto Raptors at home. For the sake of Detroit fans everywhere, let's sure hope so.
